rules.summary: The C allele at rs4149056 is associated with reduced SLCO1B1 transport function and higher risk of statin-associated muscle symptoms in clinical guidelines.
TT is not associated with the reduced SLCO1B1 function seen with the C allele.

default_summary: No call or unrecognized genotype for rs4149056.
suggestion: If you take statins, discuss possible muscle-related side effects with a clinician. Do not change medications based on this app.

evidence_level.summary: CPIC guidelines exist for SLCO1B1 and statin therapy.

limitations: Medication response depends on many factors. This is not a clinical test or dosing advice.
references: CPIC guidelines for SLCO1B1 and statins (PharmGKB/CPIC)
